about_the_game:
Looks like you're in trouble and no one can help you.
Inspired by Gnarled Hag and Granny. You play as a girl who needs to escape from an old dilapidated house where a scary old man lives.
The demo version has a limited number of rooms that you have to explore, no plot and fewer puzzles that will be easier to solve to complete the demo, so it's better to get to know it.

name: Forgotten house Demo
short_description: Be QUIET, otherwise he will notice you. You want to find a way out of this house? Game inspired by Gnarled Hag and Granny.
